sense.def:
Z besedo
despite
napovemo dejstvo, zaradi katerega je nadaljevanje stavka presenetljivo.

seg.quote: Despite the difference in their ages they were close friends.

sense.def:
Kadar človek nekaj stori
despite himself
, tisto stori, čeprav v resnici ni nameraval.

cit.quote: proti svoji volji, v nasprotju s (svojimi) pričakovanji

seg.quote: Rose, despite herself, had to admit that she was impressed.
